    • Method Detail

      • createInvoiceStreamFor

        public static InvoiceStream createInvoiceStreamFor(@Nonnull
                                   InvoicePayer payer,
                                   Periodicity periodicity)
        Creates a new InvoiceStream with the given Periodicity for the specified Payer. Calls IInvoiceStream.customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer, InvoiceStream) to customize the stream.

        Note: The new invoice stream created by this method will be in the same bundle as the payer parameter.

        This method assumes the payer is either a Producer, or if the payer is an Account, that the user does not care of policy level or custom designated unapplieds, and will use the DefaultUnapplied AccountStubI.getDefaultUnappliedFund() If the user wishes to specify a particular designated unapplied for this new invoice stream, they should use createInvoiceStreamFor(gw.bc.accounting.entity.UnappliedFund, gw.bc.system.typekey.Periodicity)

        Parameters:
        payer - the owner of the new InvoiceStream
        periodicity - the Periodicity for the new stream
        Returns:
        a new InvoiceStream with the given Periodicity and Payer.

      • createInvoiceStreamFor

        public static InvoiceStream createInvoiceStreamFor(@Nonnull
                                   UnappliedFund unappliedFund,
                                   Periodicity periodicity)
        Creates a new InvoiceStream with the given Periodicity for the specified Payer. Calls IInvoiceStream.customizeNewInvoiceStream(InvoicePayer, InvoiceStream) to customize the stream.

        Note: The new invoice stream created by this method will be in the same bundle as the unappliedFund parameter.

        Parameters:
        unappliedFund - the unappliedFund on the invoice stream
        periodicity - the Periodicity for the new stream
        Returns:
        a new InvoiceStream with the given Periodicity and Payer.
